type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ComponentMetadata
type.description: Provides a read-only view of a resolved component's metadata, which typically originates from a component descriptor (Ivy file, Maven POM).

method.name: getId
method.description:
Returns the identifier of the component.

returns:the identifier of the component.

method.name: getStatus
method.description:
Returns the status of the component. Must match one of the values in #getStatusScheme().

returns:the status of the component

method.name: getStatusScheme
method.description:
Returns the status scheme of the component. Values are ordered from least to most mature status. Defaults to ["integration", "milestone", "release"].

returns:the status scheme of the component

method.name: isChanging
method.description:
Tells whether the component is changing or immutable.

returns:whether the component is changing or immutable.

property.name: changing
property.description:
Tells whether the component is changing or immutable.

returns:whether the component is changing or immutable.

property.name: id
property.description:
Returns the identifier of the component.

returns:the identifier of the component.

property.name: statusScheme
property.description:
Returns the status scheme of the component. Values are ordered from least to most mature status. Defaults to ["integration", "milestone", "release"].

returns:the status scheme of the component

property.name: status
property.description:
Returns the status of the component. Must match one of the values in #getStatusScheme().

returns:the status of the component
